turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Hi there! How can I help?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi. I wanted to place an order at Starbucks for pickup.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What can I get started for you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want to get a caffè mocha.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Could I please have a venti?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Do you have a preference on milk?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes. Could I please have soy milk?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Would you like to add any sugar or other sweeteners?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, could you please add six Splendas?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Will this drink iced or hot?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay and would you like to add whip cream?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No whipped cream, but I still want the chocolate drizzle on top.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Alright! i got a Venti Caffe Mocha with soy milk with 6 Splendas and topped with chocolate drizzle.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: May I ask the location you'd like to pick this up at?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want it to be placed at the location on 20th and Market Street.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure, give me a moment to find the perfect location.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay i found a starbucks on 1900 Market St, Philadelphia, is that the one you'd like to pick this up at?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Wonderful! give me a moment to submit your order.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Alright, your order has been sent to your desired location. It will be ready for pickup in 5-8 min.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: anything else I can do for you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, that's it. Thank you so much for your help today.
